articles.description: The CDC has reported that there were 81,230 drug overdose deaths -- a new record, driven by fentanyl, accelerating during pandemic lockdowns.
articles.content: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has reported that there were 81,230 drug overdose deaths in the year ending May 2020 — a new record, driven by fentanyl, with deaths accelerating … [+2054 chars]
